title: Mac Startup Disk Full Issue
content: Your Mac startup disk is full, causing slow performance. Delete unnecessary files or use external storage.

title: External Device Not Recognized on Windows
content: Windows is not detecting your external USB or hard drive. Try updating drivers or checking connections.

title: Bluetooth Not Working on Mac
content: Mac Bluetooth is not connecting to devices. Restart Bluetooth services and reset PRAM/NVRAM.

title: Windows Update Stuck
content: Windows update is stuck at a certain percentage. Restart the update service or boot in safe mode.

title: Mac Keyboard Not Responding
content: Mac keyboard is unresponsive. Try resetting the SMC or using an external keyboard to diagnose the issue.

title: Windows Blue Screen of Death (BSOD)
content: Windows is crashing with a blue screen error. Analyze the error code and check for faulty drivers.

title: MacBook Battery Draining Fast
content: MacBook battery drains quickly. Check battery health, reduce background apps, and adjust power settings.

title: Windows WiFi Keeps Disconnecting
content: Windows WiFi randomly disconnects. Reset network settings and update the wireless adapter driver.

title: Mac Sound Not Working
content: Mac audio is not working. Ensure output device is selected correctly and reset the core audio process.

title: Windows Slow Performance Issue
content: Windows PC running slow. Clean disk, disable startup apps, and check for malware.

title: MacBook Overheating Issue
content: MacBook overheating. Check fan operation, clean dust, and reduce CPU-intensive tasks.

title: Windows Defender Not Updating
content: Windows Defender fails to update. Check internet connection and manually update virus definitions.

title: Mac External Monitor Not Detected
content: Mac does not detect an external monitor. Check cables, update macOS, and reset display settings.

title: Windows Printer Not Responding
content: Windows printer is unresponsive. Restart the print spooler service and check driver compatibility.

title: Mac App Store Not Downloading Apps
content: Mac App Store fails to download apps. Sign out and back into iCloud, clear cache, and restart.
